弱.definition: weak; feeble; young; inferior; not as good as; (following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

弱不禁風.definition: lit. too weak to stand up to the wind (idiom); fig. extremely delicate; fragile

弱勢群體.definition: disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped); the economically and politically marginalized; the dispossessed

弱小.definition: small and weak; puny; the small and weak; children; women and children

弱相互作用.definition: weak interaction (in particle physics); weak force

弱肉強食.definition: lit. the weak are prey to the strong (idiom); fig. the law of the jungle

弱電統一.definition: electro-weak interaction in fermion particle physics

弱音踏板.definition: soft pedal (on piano); una corda pedal
